categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Whirlwind was one of twelve Imperial-class Star Destroyer owned by Supreme Warlord Blitzer Harrsk in the years following the death of Palpatine's clones.

Eight years after the Battle of Endor, Harrsk was attacked by a fleet of Victory-class Star Destroyers under the command of rival warlord High Admiral Treuten Teradoc—the battle cost Harrsk his flagship, the heavily modified Star Destroyer Shockwave.

Thirsty for revenge, Harrsk took command of his fleet from aboard the Whirlwind—with Admiral Daala assisting from aboard the Star Destroyer Firestorm—and launched a retaliatory strike against Teradoc. While in the midst of the raid, Daala—angry over the chaotic state of the Empire and the loss of her loyal second-in-command, Commander Kratas—disabled the Whirlwind with a volley of ion cannon fire, then opened a comm channel to both Harrsk's and Teradoc's forces requesting an end to in-fighting, and the selection of a commander to lead the remaining Imperial forces against the New Republic; if not such demands were met, she would self-destruct the Firestorm, taking with her Whirlwind and all surrounding vessels.

Following the negotiations at Tsoss Beacon and the reunification of the Deep Core warlords, Whirlwind fell into the hands of the combined fleet under Daala and then-Vice Admiral Gilad Pellaeon. It would serve as part of a force of forty-five Star Destroyers under Pellaeon's command, and part of his personal armada of thirteen.
